channel.title: Demise pking
channel.description: hay guys i got a demise pking client and i wanna change it to my server name... whenever i do that, it gives me this error when i run client not when i compile! [QUOTE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Unknown constant tag 0 in class file client at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/QUOTE] please help ty :)

item.title: Demise pking
item.dc:creator: @moe230 moe230
item.description:
@moe230 wrote:

hay guys i got a demise pking client and i wanna change it to my server name…
whenever i do that, it gives me this error when i run client not when i compile!

[QUOTE]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ClassFormatError: Unknown constant tag 0 in
class file client
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14
1)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
[/QUOTE]
please help ty
